column4: I dont get that in version 10.10 in 2010 the os can have a problem detecting DVI?
stupid nvidia cards always use analog-out as vid#1
personal xorg.conf where devices were set correct. pls google for more info, its too long ago i needed it
the nvidia-driver has options for that
my workaround was to buy a card with 2x DVI ;)
or try using nvidia-settings to generate a xorg.conf for you
copy it to /etc/X11/xorg.conf and restart X. it should be used automatically
you can't there are no runlevels anymore since upstart
sudo service gdm stop           from terminal, start after generating xorg.conf
iirc it will prevent X starting
